content:
Diagnosis:

Cervical adenocarcinoma Stage IB2

Surgery 15 Jan 2024 - Radical hysterectomy and pelvic lymph node dissection

Histology:
Moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma
HPV 16 positive, p16 positive
Lymphovascular invasion present
Clear margins
Lymph nodes negative (0/22)

Previous medical history:
Nil significant

Current medications:
None

Allergies:
None known

Current situation:
First post-treatment follow up

CT thorax/abdomen/pelvis 12 March 2024 - No evidence of disease

I reviewed [redacted name] today for her first follow-up appointment following completion of treatment. She has recovered well from surgery with no current concerns. Examination shows good vault healing. Performance status is 0. She has returned to work full time as a teacher. The plan is for continued 3-monthly follow up in the gynae-oncology clinic with annual CT imaging. Next appointment will be arranged for June 2024.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma, lymphovascular invasion present, clear margins, lymph nodes negative (0/22)

cancer_timeline.value: Radical hysterectomy and pelvic lymph node dissection
CT thorax/abdomen/pelvis shows no evidence of disease

patient_facts.value: returned to work full time as a teacher

status_updates.value: Stage IB2 cervical adenocarcinoma treated with radical surgery. First follow-up showing good recovery with no evidence of disease.
Good recovery from surgery with return to full time work
Continue 3-monthly follow up in gynae-oncology clinic with next appointment June 2024
